text: Technical Sales Specialist Information Management (IM) Big Data PortfolioJob ID S_D-0752353 Job type Full-time RegularWork country USA Position type ProfessionalWork city - Any (DE),DE, - Any (MD),MD, - Any (PA),PA Posted 18-Sep-2015Travel 25% travel annually Job area SalesBusiness group IBM Sales & Distribution Job category SalesBusiness unit AnalyticSWSales Job role Client Technical Specialist Job role skillset IM.BigData-MAJCommissionable/Sales-Incentive jobs only YesJob descriptionTechnical Sales Specialists are IBM’s technical sales consultant to our clients and a technical sales leader for IBM sales teams. The candidate will learn your client's business requirements, technical requirements, and competitive landscape and apply your technical knowledge and experience to bring new solutions to your assigned clients. The candidate will be responsible for collaborating with IBM sales teams to define, design, and detail the technical aspects and feasibility of proposed solutions. The candidate will deliver solution workshops, product demonstrations, technical education, and Proof of Concepts. The candidate will support technical escalations, design solutions, and answer technical questions throughout the sales process in order to progress and close sales and develop customer relationships. Technical Sales Specialists will assist the IBM sales team with quantifying the value proposition of our solutions with clients. The Technical Sales Specialist has an understanding of products, offerings, and services within their specialty as well as business acumen.You will be responsible for support of the IBM Analytics Platform Solution for your assigned territory.Required Responsibilities:Taking initiatives to own accounts and issues and driving team members toward the common goal of winning businessArticulating technical benefits of IBM’s Analytics Platform Cloud and on-premise solutions and services to all levels in customer's organization Identifying client’s business and technical requirementsBuilding and maintaining relationships with key decisions makers and influencersDeveloping and delivering compelling demonstrations, proof of concepts, prototypes, and other pre-sales assets which tie the IBM’s Analytics Platform together around technology solutions: Big Data, Information Server, Pure Data Systems, Master data management, Information governance and Optim test data management to Customer ValueAssisting with Request for Proposal (RPF)/Request for Information (RFI) and other technical questionnairesSupporting training and consulting in post-sales tool and processing deployment situationsUnderstanding all Information Management technology at a high level and positioning value props for these products with clientsProviding technical assistance for marketing activities: Regional Workshops, User Group Meetings, Sales Seminars, Meet-ups, and Trade ShowsDemonstrated technical aptitude, customer-facing and presentation skills, business value aptitude, written communication, and interpersonal skillsComfortable working independently in a mobile environmentRequired * At least 3 years experience in Software Presales, Sales Engineering, or Consulting * Readiness to travel 25% travel annually * English: Fluent
